Description: Oval fragment of polychrome glass inlay (described as a polished agate scaraboid in the register), possibly from ring bezel.
Curator's comments: Parallel from Pompeii (but cut as an intaglio) (Cool 2016, 49-51). Probably not finished, but intended to be cut and set in the bezel of a ring. Cool, H. E. M. 2016. The small finds and vessel glass from Insula VI.1 Pompeii: Excavations 1995-2006. Oxford: Archaeopress, Roman Archaeology 17.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (QA.29)
